events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to return it and get a refund because it doesn't fit properly and I am not satisfied with the item.
The customer's request involves a refund and return of a purchased product due to sizing issues.
Routing the refund case to the Returns and Refunds department for proper handling and response.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like to return your jacket and request a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
My order number is 2457893, and the jacket is brand new, still with tags attached. I haven't worn or damaged it.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund upon return. Please use the prepaid shipping label sent to your email to return the jacket.
Thanks for the quick reply. I have received the shipping label and will send the jacket back tomorrow.
Great! Once we receive your return, we will process your refund immediately. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you have sent the jacket back and if the refund has been processed successfully.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and already received the refund. Thank you for your help throughout the process.
We're glad to hear the refund was successful. Closing this case now, and please reach out anytime if you need further assistance.
